Package View

package View
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    AdminView
    The AdminView class represents the main interface for administrators in the hospital management system.
    AppointmentOutcomeView
    The AppointmentOutcomeView class handles the user interface for managing appointment outcomes.
    DisplayAppointmentDetailView
    The DisplayAppointmentDetailView class provides an interface for administrators to view details of specific appointments in the hospital management system.
    DisplayDoctorAppointment
    The DisplayDoctorAppointment class manages the doctor's interface for handling appointments.
    DisplayMedicationInventory
    The DisplayMedicationInventory class provides an interface for administrators to view the medical inventory in the hospital management system.
    DisplayPatientAppointment
    The DisplayPatientAppointment class manages the patient's interface for handling appointments.
    DisplayStaffView
    The DisplayStaffView class provides an interface for administrators to view hospital staff based on specific filters in the hospital management system.
    DoctorView
    The DoctorView class provides the interface for doctors to manage their responsibilities.
    HospitalManagementAppView
    The HospitalManagementAppView class represents the main interface of the hospital management system.
    InventoryView
    The InventoryView class provides an interface for pharmacists to view and manage the medication inventory in the hospital management system.
    LoginView
    The LoginView class provides an interface for handling user authentication for the hospital management system.
    MainView
    The MainView class is an abstract base class for all views in the hospital management system.
    ManageMedicalInventory
    The ManageMedicalInventory class provides an interface for administrators to manage the medical inventory in the hospital management system.
    ManageReplenishmentRequestView
    The ManageReplenishmentRequestView class provides an interface for administrators to manage replenishment requests in the hospital management system.
    ManageStaffAccountView
    The ManageStaffAccountView class provides an interface for administrators to manage hospital staff accounts in the hospital management system.
    PatientView
    The PatientView class provides an interface for patients to interact with the hospital management system.
    PaymentView
    The PaymentView class handles the user interface for managing patient payments.
    PharmacistView
    The PharmacistView class represents the user interface for pharmacists in the hospital management system.
